title: Egyptian lentil soup
ingredients: ['700ml water', '200g red lentils', '1 ripe tomato, quartered', '1 carrot, quartered', '1 small onion, quartered', '4 cloves garlic, quartered', '1/4 chicken stock cube', '250ml water', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '1/2 teaspoon cracked black pepper', '1/4 teaspoon ground coriander']
